subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Preakness Stakes
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Members of the Zayat family traveled to Egypt before heading to Baltimore just in time for the Preakness. Another son had to get through finals at N.Y.U.
snippet: Members of the Zayat family traveled to Egypt before heading to Baltimore just in time for the Preakness. Another son had to get through finals at N.Y.U.
